events.message: I recently received the laptop I ordered, but I noticed the screen has several scratches and the keyboard keys are sticking. This is very disappointing.
The issue has been categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's description of scratches and faulty keyboard.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the defective laptop case.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I'd like to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and the keyboard so we can assess the damage properly?
Sure, I have attached pictures of the scratches on the screen and the sticky keyboard keys as you requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know your preference and we will proceed promptly.
I would prefer to receive a replacement laptop rather than a refund, please. Thanks for the quick response!
We have processed your replacement request. The new laptop will be shipped within 3 business days with tracking details provided via email.
Just checking in to ensure you received the replacement laptop and that it meets your expectations. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and everything is perfect. Thank you for resolving this quickly and efficiently.
We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for your cooperation, and feel free to reach out in the future if you need help.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We would appreciate your feedback on our support service.
